name: A day to be a real craftsman
description:
Are you ready to become a genuine craftsman? Join our trip and come to my village! You will not only have opportunity to visit and learn the culture, the history of traditional pottery village in Hoi An (of over 500 years old). You also have the chance to meet the artisans of the village and learn how to make the potteries like a professional craftsman and keep that 'masterpiece' as a souvenir or a meaningful gift for your loved ones with a strong sense of love as the cohesion of clay and water. 
 Now, live one day as a Vietnamese artisans with clay-stained hands on!
